    • chooseTargetToRob

      public void chooseTargetToRob()
      When the player embodies the thief, choose the character to rob from the list of possibles targets. If an opponent has 5 or more districts in his city, Richard will focus the bishop or the warlord if the player can embody them.

    • chooseMagicianPower

      public void chooseMagicianPower()
      Description copied from interface: Choices
      When the player embodies the magician, choose which power he should use, when he should use it, and consequently either the character to exchange his hand with from the list of possibles targets or the cards from his hands he should discard and replace by cards from the pile

    • chooseTargetToDestroy

      public void chooseTargetToDestroy()
      When the player embodies the warlord, choose the character and the district in city to destroy from the list of possibles targets. If the player who embodies the king has 5 or more districts in his city, Richard will destroy his cheapest district.
      Specified by:
      chooseTargetToDestroy in interface Choices
      Overrides:
      chooseTargetToDestroy in class Player

    • triangularCharacterChoice

      public boolean triangularCharacterChoice(Character first, Character second, Character third, Character whenAll, Character whenFirstMissing, Character whenSecondMissing, Character whenThirdMissing)
      Choose a character according to the following logic : We are searching for 3 characters and choose one if they are all available or only one of them is missing
      Parameters:
      first - the first character of the 3 searching for
      second - the second character of the 3 searching for
      third - the third character of the 3 searching for
      whenAll - the character to choose if all the 3 searching for are available
      whenFirstMissing - the character to choose if only the first character of the 3 searching is missing
      whenSecondMissing - the character to choose if only the second character of the 3 searching is missing
      whenThirdMissing - the character to choose if only the third character of the 3 searching is missing
      Returns:
      true if the character was updated

    • chooseInOrder

      public boolean chooseInOrder(Character first, Character second, Character third)
      Choose a character according to the order indicated by the parameters
      Parameters:
      first - the character to choose in priority
      second - the character to choose if the first can't be chosen
      third - the character to choose if the first and the second can't be chosen
      Returns:
      true if the character was updated
